info.lead: An overview of analysis of the latest session available at {link}.

link.text: National Assembly of the Republic of Slovenia

info.words-text: Analizo izvajamo po statistiki {words-link}. Korpus predstavljajo vsi govori, dokument pa vsi govori na seji.
info.presence-heading: Attendance at voting events by parliamentary group
info.presence-text: Parliamentary groups are sorted based on the percentage of votes their members attended.
info.votes-text: For all voting events at a session we count individual votes (FOR, AGAINST, ABSTAIN) and the number of MPs who did not vote, and display the results.
